messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy]
messages.msgSnippet: Bob, Unfortunately, no-one has any luck with him. Your friend got off lightly, he takes the shipwreck divers and archivers for $1000 s at a time. I have passed
messages.messageBody:
Bob,

Unfortunately, no-one has any luck with him. Your friend got off
lightly, he takes the shipwreck divers and archivers for $1000's at a
time.
I have passed on your friends' basic info to my guy in Poland who is
working with the police and the newspapers on this. Maybe something
happens..maybe not.
Beware of Pawel..he works in a syndicate I think, and has drivers
licence info, more pics..all the things we ask for for proof.

Brian

messages.msgSnippet: Dear All, Please allow a little bandwidth for a public service announcement; The Northern California Japanese Sword Club invites you to our annual Cherry
messages.messageBody:
Dear All,
Please allow a little bandwidth for a public service announcement;

The Northern California Japanese Sword Club invites you to our annual
Cherry Blossom display at San Francisco's Miyako Hotel. On Saturday
and Sunday April 22nd and 23rd, 2006 as part of this years' Northern
California Cherry Blossom festival, our club will put on a display of
fine Japanese Swords, Armour, sword fittings and related materials in
the Radisson Miyako Hotel Spring Room.
The display is free and open to the public, we will be there from
1100 to 1700 Saturday and 1000-1600 Sunday, we welcome people of all
ages and levels interest. If you are in "The City" that weekend, join
the festival, come see some art in steel and be sure to tell 'em Big
Tom sent you!

-t

www.ncjsc.org
www.nccbf.org
